version_description:
Fixed some bugs and improved overall user experience.

Got questions or feedback? Email help@wegamers.com

1. Broadcast: Broadcast battles and interact with your viewers in real-time! Lords Mobile, Castle Clash, Clash of Lords 2, or Clash Royale are just one of the few titles you can broadcast on WeGamers!
2. New Function: Nearby Gamers allows you to search for others playing the same games as you.
3. Added game tags to Game Celebs interface.
4. Adjusted Group Events function (Group Events can only be created by the admin and moderators)

Got questions or feedback? Email help@wegamers.com

1. New: Broadcast with camera.
2. New: Coin giveaways, exclusive VIP features, and nearby broadcast function.
3. New: Mute function available in group chats.
4. Improved: WeNet & WeAnswers.

Got questions or feedback? Email help@wegamers.com

Fixed some bugs and improved overall user experience.

Got questions or feedback? Email help@wegamers.com

1. New! Fun Photo: You can use to create fun and interesting avatars!
2. New! Speed Test: You can test your network speed and use the recommended video resolution for your broadcasts!
3. You can now gift your favorite Broadcasters free Presents!
4. You can now manage your friend or group requests without fuss!
5. Optimized group chat and WeNet’s user interface.

Got questions or feedback? Email help@wegamers.com

1. You can now send your friends a Bundle from the Points Hub!
2. A Clash of Crowns theme is now available in the store!
3. Optimized Conference Call function.

1. Christmas events
2. New function: Bundle sharing

Got questions or feedback? Email help@wegamers.com

Game Broadcaster: A verified Game Broadcaster can advertise their Studio in-game.
Fixed some bugs and improved overall user experience.

Got questions or feedback? Email help@wegamers.com

New!
1. Stories: The latest game articles, guides, and events can be found here!
2. Export: You can now export a list of your guild members.
3. Secret Scroll: A guide to group moderation found on WeNet.
4. Report: You can now report inappropriate broadcast content.

Optimized!
1. Optimized Arabic language user interface.
2. Optimized WeAnswers.
3. Optimized Conference Call.

Got questions or feedback? Email help@wegamers.com

New:
1. Broadcast - You can now broadcast any games! (You can only broadcast selected games on the previous version in iOS11 and higher.)
2. Stories - Read the latest game articles and guides! You can also leave thoughts and suggestions for the writers.
3. Search - You can now search for an article or post in Stories and WeNet!
4. Tag - You can now tag users on WeNet!
5. You can send Hero Namecards to WeGamers via Castle Clash!
Optimized:
1. Siren
2. Fun Photo & Video - Added a function that suggests optimal distance for taking photos/videos.
Got questions or feedback? Email help@wegamers.com

New:
1. Group recommendation function.
2. New Game Celeb prerequisites.

Optimized:
1. User experience for new users.
2. Game Page.
3. User experience for Stories function.

Got questions or feedback? Email help@wegamers.com

WeGamers 3.0 new version is coming!
- All-new function in which the system automatically recommends popular posts, broadcasts, and more according to your preferences!
- All-new content, long posts, stories, videos, and WeAnswers in one location for easy viewing!
- Game Pages contain all the essential game details you need to know! You can even socialize with other players from the same game!
- Optimized features to improve user experience!
Fixed some bugs and improved overall user experience.
Fixed some bugs and improved overall user experience.

Fixed:
1. Unresponsive long tap reply button in the comments section.
2. Some posts lack the option to copy links.

Optimized:
1. The overall look for posts.
2. User experience.

3.1 Updates:
1. An all-new Profile page that shows off more exciting sides of you.
2. More comprehensive search results to get you what you want.
3. Smarter AI that recommends content that you’ll love even more.
4. Better GIF support to let you send all the fun and cool GIFs in your chats.
5. Other optimizations that improve user experience.

Fixed some bugs and improved overall user experience.

Got questions or feedback? Email help@wegamers.com

V4.2:
1. All-new [Community] function is waiting for you to explore! Check it out and find others playing the same games as you.
2. You can now log in to WeGamers via Apple ID if you updated your device to iOS 13.
3. [Recent] can be found on the main page. You can now easily access your recent visits.
4. Due to WeGamers undergoing a revamp, the Broadcast function is no longer available.
5. Fixed some bugs and optimized user experience.

Fixed some bugs and improved overall user experience.

Got questions or feedback? Email help@wegamers.com

Fixed some bugs and improved overall user experience. 

Got questions or feedback? Email:help@wegamers.com.

1. You can now sticky your favorite posts on your Profile. (Currently, only available for Celebs and Certified accounts.)
2. Updated Game Page: Optimized tools and how content is displayed.
3. First Lords Mobile Game Tool added. More coming soon!
4. Fixed some bugs and optimized user experience.

1. Game Pages can now have moderators. If you love one of the games supported on WeGamers, come join us as a moderator!
2. You can now Check-In to Game Pages to earn Points!
3. Optimized and tweaked WeGamers. You can now view different content in different languages!
4. Optimized user experience.

Fixed some bugs and improved overall user experience.

V3.3 Patch Notes:
1. Optimized new user tutorial.
2. Optimized Celeb system. You can now gain more exposure and exclusive privileges.
3. Mission system is now live. You can complete missions to earn more Point rewards.
4. Fixed some bugs and optimized overall user experience.

v3.4 Patch Notes
1. Added Chatroom function. You can join chatrooms any time and chat with anyone.
2. Optimized recommendation function on the main page. There are more recommendations for you to discover!
3. Optimized Community function. It’s now much easier to navigate!
4. Fixed known bugs and optimized overall user experience.

1. Game Community has been revamped and it's easier to join any discussion with this brand new look.
2. Added #Topic# rankings. Have you ever wanted to create a topic? Or be the topic of discussion? Check out the Topics page and check out what's trending!
3. WeGamers' AI will recommend posts you may like.
4. Optimized Discover New Videos function. We can't wait to see what new game videos you have in store for us!
5. Other optimizations.

1.You can now post Youtube videos on WeGamers! Share your favorite videos with your fellow gamers!
2.Optimized feedback and help. If you have any questions, head over to "Me” and check out possible solutions.
3.Fixed other bugs and optimized user experience.

v4.0 brings a new look to WeGamers!
1. New: Levels. Raise your account level to unlock more privileges.
2. New: Night Mode. Turn on Night Mode to lessen the strain on your eyes while using WeGamers at night.
3. Optimized Posts, Archives, Bundles, and more!
4. Fixed bugs and enhanced overall user experience.
